controller.songplayer

Interface SongInfosManager

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SongPlayer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MidiSongPlayer, SampledSongPlayer

    public interface SongInfosManager
    This class manage the information of a song in reproduction
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDuration()
      Obtain the length of the song, expressed in second
      double getElapsedTime()
      This method return the elapsed time from the begin of the song
      void setPosition(int time)
      This method is used for set the position in the song open in the clip

    • Method Detail

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(int time)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method is used for set the position in the song open in the clip
        Parameters:
        time, - the microsecond past from the begin of the song
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter time is out of the range of the song

      • getDuration

        double getDuration()
        Obtain the length of the song, expressed in second
        Returns:
        the length of the track

      • getElapsedTime

        double getElapsedTime()
        This method return the elapsed time from the begin of the song
        Returns:
        the elapsed second from the song's begin
